title: aDaDA nara manidAun ANava
sahitya:
aDaDA nara manidA un ANava mAyattai viDaDA


anupallavi

  shuDaDA poyyai shuDaDA shuTri shuTri vaLai paTraru mAyattai viDaDA


caraNam    uLLak-kAmAdigaL uLLE varAmalE taDuDA koLLai pOna pinbu kollai shATri en mUDhA 
ennai malaiyAkki Eikkum kalaiyirp-pughAdEDA inbamirukkinrad-anbu nilaiyilE pAraDA
